Name: South Side Rickey
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge and mint sprigs.
Garnish with lime wedge and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: Think gin-based Mojito – refreshing and easy drinking.
History: The classic South Side Fizz served as a Ricky. (Fizzes are served in highball glasses without ice while Rickeys are served over cracked ice.)
